Text:
SPOKEN LANGUAGE SAYS ENGLISH , SO IS IT JUST PART 1 THAT IS IN GERMAN , IF SO , PITY THERE IS NO SUBS FOR IT  .

THANKS FOR UPLOAD .

Die Deutsche Wochenschau Nr 516 ONLY is in German. The rest is English or German with English subs as when German veterans are speaking in the recently made main features. The lack of English subs in the newsreel doesn't matter much really.
